Detailed Description

Memory pool descriptor.

Field Documentation

u8_t* memp_desc::base

Base address.

Referenced by memp_init_pool().

u16_t memp_desc::num

Number of elements.

Referenced by memp_init_pool().

u16_t memp_desc::size

Element size.

Referenced by memp_init_pool().

struct memp** memp_desc::tab

First free element of each pool.

Elements form a linked list.

Referenced by memp_free(), and memp_init_pool().
